message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Constructive session for mid/small caps. Momentum broadened with strong moves in autos (ASHOKLEY), select capital goods (BHEL), and IT (KPITTECH). PSU rail/infrastructure stayed firm (RVNL), while our holdings mostly consolidated: GMRAIRPORT held above its 105.5 breakout, NBCC retested its 117.5 zone, HUDCO remained in a strong uptrend, and IDBI stayed in the 100–105 base. Bias: strength-only buys into breakouts; keep protective stops active. Prefer executing new positions Monday unless key breakouts trigger decisively tomorrow.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "signal": "Hold; add on strength", "reason": "Breakout intact above 105.5; add only on strength >107.3 with risk reference 101.9.", "price": 106.69},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Retest-buy setup", "reason": "Retest of 117.5 breakout; buy strength >118.9 or dips 114–115; risk ~111.5.", "price": 117.42},
    {"symbol": "HUDCO", "signal": "Trend continuation", "reason": "Higher-highs intact; buy dips 236–239 or add through 242; risk ~221.", "price": 239.57},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Two-sided plan", "reason": "Accumulate near 100–101 with stop ~96, or buy momentum only above 105.", "price": 101.19},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Breakout buy on strength", "reason": "Continuation above 329.9 can open 338/345; risk reference ~311.", "price": 324.55},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Buy on pullback/strength", "reason": "Cleared 287–292 supply; buy pullbacks to 286–288 or strength >292; risk 282/276.", "price": 290.85},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Coiling base; sustained close >415 with volume starts next leg; risk ~392.", "price": 404.25},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Continuation watch", "reason": "Tight base; continuation above 310 with volume; trail risk 297/291.", "price": 308.25},
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Continuation buy", "reason": "Closed strong; sustained >353 can extend; risk marker ~332.", "price": 351.75},
    {"symbol": "KPITTECH", "signal": "Breakout continuation (small size)", "reason": "Flag breakout; use tight stop under ~1168 due to volatility.", "price": 1218.9},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Strength-only", "reason": "Reclaimed 413; follow-through above 418/432 improves odds; risk ~403.", "price": 413.05},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Testing zone; sustained >330 targets 335–340; risk ~312.", "price": 325.8},
    {"symbol": "SJVN", "signal": "Range breakout watch", "reason": "Range 78–80; buy only on breakout >80 with stop ~77.", "price": 78.88},
    {"symbol": "NTPCGREEN", "signal": "Tight-range breakout", "reason": "Break >95.5 confirms; risk ~93.7.", "price": 95.0},
    {"symbol": "IRB", "signal": "Trend continuation (low-ticket)", "reason": "Buy dips toward 42.8–43.0 with stop ~41.5; steady uptrend.", "price": 43.2},
    {"symbol": "ASHOKLEY", "signal": "Momentum pullback buy", "reason": "Strong breakout day; prefer pullbacks to 156–158; invalidation below 149.5.", "price": 159.75}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Break of base would negate breakout; protect capital.", "quantity": 50, "price": "SL-M 101.90"},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Failure of breakout-retest if 111.5 breaks; curb drawdown.", "quantity": 60, "price": "SL-M 111.50"},
    {"symbol": "HUDCO", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Trend violation if it loses the prior swing base.", "quantity": 30, "price": "SL-M 221.00"},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Invalidation of accumulation thesis below 96.", "quantity": 40, "price": "SL-M 96.00"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 3569.9,
    "total_value": 27184.3,
    "holdings_count": 4,
    "holdings": [
      "GMRAIRPORT: 50 units @ Buy 106.80 (CMP 106.69)",
      "NBCC: 60 units @ Buy 118.52 (CMP 117.42)",
      "HUDCO: 30 units @ Buy 239.25 (CMP 239.57)",
      "IDBI: 40 units @ Buy 101.71 (CMP 101.19)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU rail/infrastructure: RVNL firm; clean trigger above 329.9. IRCON stable; momentum only >165.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories: BSE strong close near 2930; consider pullbacks >2879. CDSL reclaimed 1605 yesterday; needs >1665 for momentum.",
    "Capital goods/cables: BHEL constructive above 287–292; BEL needs >418/432. KEI/Polycab steady but rich; size small.",
    "Banks/NBFC: LTF coiling under 310; PSU banks (IDBI/UCO/IOB/CENTRALBK) range-bound—favor dip-buys with tight stops or breakouts.",
    "Metals: HINDCOPPER flirting with 330; SAIL still below 145 cap—avoid until breakout.",
    "Power/Renewables: NTPCGREEN tight near 95; InoxWind choppy—prefer strength-only with tight risk.",
    "IT/Services: KPITTECH breakout continuation; COFORGE/MPHASIS constructive but volatile—keep size small.",
    "Discretionary/FMCG: Voltas steady; Trent firm; JUBLFOOD needs >612–619 for momentum.",
    "Autos: ASHOKLEY posted a strong breakout; look for pullback entries rather than chasing highs.",
    "Execution: Prefer entries Monday; if tomorrow gaps >0.7%, let 20–30 minutes set range and buy pullbacks into marked levels with predefined stops."
  ]
}
